name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】PHANTOMIME Release Mini Live Show! ｜｜ Mori Calliope #calliolive [VQxFBBlec38]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope performs 'Skeletons', a collaboration song with Yafure.
MC section where Mori Calliope thanks the audience and talks about her new album 'PHANTOMIME'.
End credits and title screen for the live show.

subtitles.original: Like they don't figure that improvement's a process
subtitles.english: Like they don't figure that improvement's a process

subtitles.original: You lose some, you talk less, you work on your aim

subtitles.original: Yeah

subtitles.original: Thank you.
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: That was Skeletons, my collaboration song with Yafure-san.
subtitles.english: That was Skeletons, my collaboration song with Yafure-san.

subtitles.original: I hope that you guys enjoyed the show today...
subtitles.english: I hope that you guys enjoyed the show today...

subtitles.original: ...but as all wonderful plays must come to an end,
subtitles.english: ...but as all wonderful plays must come to an end,

subtitles.original: so must this live.
subtitles.english: so must this live.

subtitles.original: But wherever you are in your life, as an actor or player
subtitles.english: But wherever you are in your life, as an actor or player

subtitles.original: in the grand play that is existence,
subtitles.english: in the grand play that is existence,

subtitles.original: I hope you're doing well and I hope that these songs
subtitles.english: I hope you're doing well and I hope that these songs

subtitles.original: provide some kind of happiness for you in your time of need.
subtitles.english: provide some kind of happiness for you in your time of need.

subtitles.original: Whatever that time might be, I guess.
subtitles.english: Whatever that time might be, I guess.

subtitles.original: I hope that you'll listen to PHANTOMIME.
subtitles.english: I hope that you'll listen to PHANTOMIME.

subtitles.original: 本当に、えっと、聴いてください。本当に聴いてほしい。
subtitles.english: Really, um, please listen to it. I really want you to listen.

subtitles.original: PHANTOMIME、新アルバムです。
subtitles.english: PHANTOMIME is my new album.

subtitles.original: マジで、今まで一番最高の作品になりました。
subtitles.english: Seriously, it has become my best work to date.

subtitles.original: チェックしてください。
subtitles.english: Please check it out.

subtitles.original: I'd really love it if you could listen to it lots
subtitles.english: I'd really love it if you could listen to it lots

subtitles.original: and share it, help me share it with the world.
subtitles.english: and share it, help me share it with the world.

subtitles.original: Help me share with the world my best piece until now.
subtitles.english: Help me share with the world my best piece until now.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much everyone.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much everyone.

subtitles.original: Peace!
subtitles.english: Peace!

subtitles.original: Mori Calliope
subtitles.english: Mori Calliope

subtitles.original: PHANTOMIME
